alert.note: Alert for Halifax; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 10:19AM EST until January 25 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Lower Roanoke River At Roanoke Rapids affecting Halifax and Northampton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lower Roanoke River at Roanoke Rapids. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. Farmlands and timberlands adjacent to the river in Roanoke Rapids flood. Property on the farmlands may be at risk from floodwaters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM EST Wednesday was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Lower Roanoke River Roanoke Rapids 9.0 9.2 Wed 10 am ES 8.3 7.8 7.3 5.9 &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rah/rivers. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1030 PM EST.
